title: Pilot
synopsis: When an unassuming high school chemistry teacher discovers he has cancer, he decides to team up with a former student to secure his family's future by manufacturing crystal meth.

title: Cat's in the Bag...
synopsis: Walt and Jesse attempt to tie up loose ends. The desperate situation gets more complicated with the flip of a coin.

title: ...And the Bag's in the River
synopsis: Walter fights with Jesse over his drug use, causing him to leave Walter alone with their captive, Krazy-8.

title: Cancer Man
synopsis: Walter finally tells his family about his cancer diagnosis.

title: Gray Matter
synopsis: Walter and Skyler attend a party. Hank is worried that Walter Jr. is getting involved with drugs.

title: Crazy Handful of Nothin'
synopsis: The side effects of chemo start to plague Walt. Meanwhile, the DEA rounds up suspected dealers.

title: A No-Rough-Stuff-Type Deal
synopsis: Walt and Jesse attempt to make a deal with Tuco Salamanca.

title: Seven Thirty-Seven
synopsis: Walt and Jesse realize how dire their situation is. They must come up with a plan to kill Tuco.

title: Grilled
synopsis: Walt and Jesse are kidnapped by Tuco and taken to his uncle's house in the desert.

title: Bit by a Dead Bee
synopsis: Walt and Jesse cover their tracks. Marie and Hank comfort Skyler.

title: Down
synopsis: Jesse decides to make some money on the side. Walt's confidence as a drug lord grows.

title: Breakage
synopsis: Jesse's new business partner becomes a problem. Skyler confronts Walt about his recent behavior.

title: Peekaboo
synopsis: Jesse goes to retrieve stolen property from addicts. Walt's lies push Skyler to the limit.

title: Negro y Azul
synopsis: Walt's product becomes a hit, creating more problems for him and Jesse.

title: Better Call Saul
synopsis: Badger gets arrested. Saul Goodman agrees to represent him.

title: 4 Days Out
synopsis: Walt and Jesse get stranded in the desert after a marathon crystal cooking session.

title: Over
synopsis: Walt learns some unsettling news about his health. Walter Jr. confronts his father.

title: Mandala
synopsis: Jesse's relationship with Jane is put on hold when he and Walt start doing business with Gus.

title: Phoenix
synopsis: Walt's money problems deepen. A desperate Jesse agrees to a partnership with a former associate.

title: ABQ
synopsis: Jesse faces charges. Skyler learns of Walt's lies. The aftermath of the plane crash is revealed.

title: No Mas
synopsis: As Walt copes with the aftermath of the plane crash, Skyler becomes increasingly suspicious of his activities.

title: Caballo Sin Nombre
synopsis: Walt faces a new threat. Jesse tries to make amends with his family.

title: I.F.T.
synopsis: Walt ignores Skyler's demands. Gus' actions have severe consequences.

title: Green Light
synopsis: Walt loses control. Jesse becomes suspicious of his benefactor.

title: Mas
synopsis: Gus decides to teach Walt a lesson. The Cousins head north.

title: Sunset
synopsis: Walt and Jesse find themselves in the crosshairs. Hank's investigation of Jesse intensifies.

title: One Minute
synopsis: Hank faces dire consequences from his confrontation with Jesse. Walt presents his wife with a difficult choice.

title: I See You
synopsis: While Hank recovers, Walt and Jesse look for a new partner. Skyler makes a disturbing discovery.

title: Kafkaesque
synopsis: Walt's world crumbles. Jesse's guilt mounts.

title: Fly
synopsis: Walt becomes obsessed with catching a fly that contaminated the lab.

title: Abiquiu
synopsis: Jesse deals with the consequences of his actions. Walt tries to make amends with his son.

title: Half Measures
synopsis: Against Walt's advice, Jesse lashes out. Hank struggles with the aftermath of his attack.

title: Full Measure
synopsis: Jesse and Walt face the deadly consequences of their actions with Gus.

title: Box Cutter
synopsis: Walt and Jesse face Gus' wrath after Jesse kills Gale. Gus takes action.

title: Thirty-Eight Snub
synopsis: Walt takes drastic action to protect his family. Jesse struggles with guilt.

title: Open House
synopsis: Walt and Jesse must do whatever it takes to buy time. Skyler makes a major decision.

title: Bullet Points
synopsis: The Cartel takes measures into their own hands. Walt must deal with a problematic situation.

title: Shotgun
synopsis: When Jesse goes missing, Walt fears the worst. Skyler has an unlikely reunion.

title: Cornered
synopsis: Skyler makes an unsettling discovery. Walt takes on new responsibilities at the car wash.

title: Problem Dog
synopsis: Jesse attempts to make amends. Walt's experiment to plant a deadly poison goes awry.

title: Hermanos
synopsis: Skyler develops a plan. Walt learns a surprising piece of information about Gus.

title: Bug
synopsis: Skyler's involvement in Walt's activities deepens. Hank's investigation gets a significant lead.

title: Salud
synopsis: Walt takes control of business matters. Jesse deals with the cartel.

title: Crawl Space
synopsis: Walt makes a desperate attempt to save his family. Skyler's plan to launder money hits a snag.

title: End Times
synopsis: Hank pushes Gomez to pursue a new theory. Walt defends his family.

title: Face Off
synopsis: Walt and Jesse team up to take on Gus. With Saul's help, Walt finds an unexpected ally.

title: Live Free or Die
synopsis: Walt, Jesse, and Mike work to cover their tracks. Hank gets back to work.

title: Madrigal
synopsis: Walt, Jesse, and Mike deal with the aftermath of Gus' death. Mike receives a surprise visit.

title: Hazard Pay
synopsis: Walt, Jesse, and Mike establish a new venue for their operation.

title: Fifty-One
synopsis: Walt celebrates his 51st birthday. Skyler takes steps to keep the children safe.

title: Dead Freight
synopsis: Walt and Jesse put a plan in action to obtain methylamine without Lydia's help.

title: Buyout
synopsis: Walt, Jesse, and Mike struggle over the future of their business. Hank returns to work.

title: Say My Name
synopsis: Walt takes control of business matters. Mike prepares to leave the business.

title: Gliding Over All
synopsis: Walt makes a new alliance. Walt expands his business empire.

title: Blood Money
synopsis: As Walt and Jesse adjust to life out of the business, Hank makes a shocking discovery.

title: Buried
synopsis: Tensions build between Walt and Skyler. Hank takes steps to trap Walt.

title: Confessions
synopsis: Hank and Walt argue over Hank's investigation. Jesse confronts Walt.

title: Rabid Dog
synopsis: Walt tries to convince Jesse to leave town. Hank and Gomez confront Jesse.

title: To'hajiilee
synopsis: Things heat up as Jesse and Hank plan to trap Walt. Walt desperately tries to stop them.

title: Ozymandias
synopsis: Everyone copes with the fallout from the confrontation in the desert.

title: Granite State
synopsis: Walt goes into hiding. Jesse is imprisoned by the neo-Nazi gang.

title: Felina
synopsis: Walt's series-long transformation into Heisenberg reaches its finale as he takes care of business.
